Lyric:
[by:暮光之下]
[ti:a way to you again]
[ar:Peter Bradley Adams]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:00.00]
[00:22.38]I wandered the streets
[00:26.07]With the legs of a free man
[00:30.94]No one to follow
[00:33.79]No one to love or leave
[00:39.08]Faster and faster
[00:43.79]From place to place
[00:48.37]All I could hear then
[00:51.72]Was the sound of my feet
[00:54.44]
[00:56.35]I make my way
[00:59.71]I make my way without you
[01:04.89]I make my way
[01:07.99]I make my way without you
[01:13.64]Over and over
[01:16.17]I got lost in my head
[01:19.95]And I found the way to you again
[01:28.17]
[01:39.53]My blatant disguise
[01:42.97]Is torn at the seams now
[01:48.12]And thin is the thread
[01:50.88]Holdin' together these lies
[01:56.08]My face tells the story
[02:00.65]Line by line
[02:04.97]And every moment I thought of you
[02:08.18]Is written right there in my eyes
[02:11.20]
[02:13.83]I make my way
[02:17.33]I make my way without you
[02:22.25]I make my way
[02:25.35]I make my way without you
[02:30.69]Over and over
[02:33.92]I got lost in my head
[02:39.11]And I found the way to you again
[02:45.37]
[02:59.90]Over and over
[03:03.53]I got lost in my head
[03:08.18]And I found the way to you again
[03:15.12]
[03:18.01]I found a way to you again
[03:24.12]
